==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|漫|才}}
{{wikipedia|Manzai}}

===Etymology===
This form coined in 1933 by [[w:Yoshimoto Kogyo|Yoshimoto Kōgyō]], from {{m|ja|万才|sc=Jpan}} by changing the first character. This form popularized by {{lang|ja|大阪万才}} Osaka manzai (the Osaka region’s variant), from
{{m|ja|万歳|sc=Jpan}}, from original {{m|ja|萬歳|sc=Jpan}} by simplification of the first character.
